Emerging growth company &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the Registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section 13(a) of the Exchange Act . &#9744; Item 5.02 Departure of Directors or Certain Officers; Election of Directors; Appointment of Certain Officers; Compensatory Arrangements of Certain Officers. &#160; On December 4, 2025, Apple Inc. (&#8220;Apple&#8221;) announced that Jennifer Newstead will become Apple&#8217;s general counsel on March 1, 2026, following a transition of duties from Kate Adams, who has served as Apple&#8217;s general counsel since 2017. Ms. Newstead will join Apple as senior vice president in January, reporting to CEO Tim Cook and serving on Apple&#8217;s executive team. Ms. Adams will remain at Apple and oversee Apple&#8217;s government affairs organization until her retirement in late 2026, after which it will be led by Ms. Newstead. &#160; SIGNATURE &#160; Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the Registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned hereunto duly authorized. Date: December 5 , 2025 Apple Inc. &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; By: &#160; /s/ Kevan Parekh &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; Kevan Parekh &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; Senior Vice President, Chief Financial Officer
